H0.text: Where would you find the metatarsal bone. Hand

H1.text: Where would you find the metatarsal bone. Wrist

H2.text: Where would you find the metatarsal bone. Elbow

H3.text: Where would you find the metatarsal bone. Foot

A4.text: The metatarsal bones or metatarsus are a group of five long bones in the midfoot, located between the tarsal bones (which form the heel and the ankle) and the phalanges (toes).
